# intro
this document is the intro to git

## common commands
git init \
git log \
git status # any changes; new file; what are the changes \
git add -A # add most recent changes \
git commit -m "initial commit" # commit and with message \
git push -u origin master # "origin" is the name of repo on github; could be other name # "master" is the name of branch you are pushing \
